messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently received my order #W2378156, and I would like to exchange a couple of items. Specifically, I want to exchange the mechanical keyboard for a similar one but with clicky switches. Also, I want to exchange the smart thermostat for one that is compatible with Google Home instead of Apple HomeKit. If there isn't a keyboard that meets the clicky switches, RGB backlight, and full-size criteria, then I'd prefer to only exchange the thermostat. Could you assist me with this?

message.content: Hello! I recently received my order #W2378156, and I would like to exchange a couple of items. Specifically, I want to exchange the mechanical keyboard for a similar one but with clicky switches. Also, I want to exchange the smart thermostat for one that is compatible with Google Home instead of Apple HomeKit. If there isn't a keyboard that meets the clicky switches, RGB backlight, and full-size criteria, then I'd prefer to only exchange the thermostat. Could you assist me with this?
